name: eleanor sweater scarf
notes:
the eleanor sweater scarf is perfect for all the seasons. the simple scarf with sleeves crochet pattern can be worn in so many ways depending on how cosy you want to feel. 

this deceptively simple and versatile cover up can be a wrap cardigan, a shawl, a cowl, a regular scarf and more! made with two construction options in just one piece with simple seams for the sleeves, you’ll have it made and on in no time. 

a great beginner crochet garment project or for anyone who wants to avoid shaping or joining. the simplicity of the construction allows the half double crochet stitch texture to shine through. crocheted using us sc and hdc stitches.

*please note*-- this listing is for a pdf pattern written in english, not a finished product.

pattern features:
sizes included: xs/s/m, l/xl/2xl, 3xl/4xl/5xl to fit chest 30” -62”
skill level: easy
stitch: half double crochet and single crochet
instant pdf download
adjustable length and styling options 
full video tutorial (to support written pattern if you are a visual learner)
us crochet terms
uk stitch conversion chart

why you'll love this pattern:
two designs in one: choose whether to work in short or long rows for your sweater scarf.
great for weddings: the perfect shawl for a bride at a winter wedding.
detailed instructions: 12-page pdf in us crochet terms for clear, easy-to-follow guidance.

materials needed:
category 3 (double knit) yarn (i used amigo dk 100% acrylic,
175m / 191yds / 50g) 
approx 6 (9, 12) balls of yarn for the sweater scarf. approx 1110 (1550, 2175)yds.
crochet hook 4.5mm (g+) or the size that meets the gauge for the pattern, plus a 4mm hook if desired for tighter ribbing.
yarn needle
scissors
stitch markers

pattern includes:
detailed instructions over 12 page ebook
stitch guide
sizing chart/schematic
step by step stitch tutorial
colour inspiration page
full video tutorial
customisation guide

ideal for:
a wedding dress shawl
throwing on over jeans or a dress for a relaxed outfit too!

instant download: start crocheting your own sweater scarf with sleeves today! purchase includes immediate access to the 12-page pdf pattern in us crochet terms.

gauge: 
17 sts and 12 rows = 4" by 4"

discover a quick and easy crochet wrap pattern that you'll love to create, featuring stunning texture and a flattering design perfect for everyone. 

need help?
we're here for you! contact us anytime for pattern support or questions.
